summary.overview: CDRD is a CICS transaction that provides real-time date and time services through message queue processing. The transaction continuously monitors incoming requests and responds with current system date and time information formatted for business applications.
business_functions: Initialize System - Initialize variables, clear queue names and message buffers
Retrieve Queue Information - Get the input queue name from CICS transaction data
Set Reply Queue Name - Set the reply queue name to CARD.DEMO.REPLY.DATE
Open Input Queue - Open the input queue for reading messages with shared access
Open Output Queue - Open the reply queue for sending response messages
Open Error Queue - Open the error queue (CARD.DEMO.ERROR) for error message handling
Get Request Message - Retrieve message from input queue with 5-second wait interval
Process Date Request - Generate system date and time response for incoming requests
Format Date Response - Create formatted response message with current system date and time
Send Reply Message - Put the formatted date/time response message to the reply queue
Handle Processing Errors - Send error messages to error queue when processing fails
Process Multiple Messages - Continue processing messages until no more messages available
Close Input Queue - Close the input queue connection when processing complete
Close Output Queue - Close the reply queue connection when processing complete
Close Error Queue - Close the error queue connection when processing complete
Terminate Program - Return control to CICS and end program execution

CDRD.program_overview: Processes date and time requests from message queues and returns formatted system date/time responses

datasource_summary.name: Date Service Request Queue (INPUT-QUEUE-NAME)
datasource_summary.function: Input queue for receiving request messages for date and time processing

datasource_summary.name: Date Service Response Queue (CARD.DEMO.REPLY.DATE)
datasource_summary.function: Reply queue for sending response messages containing system date and time information

datasource_summary.name: Date Service Error Queue (CARD.DEMO.ERROR)
datasource_summary.function: Error queue for sending error messages when date processing fails or encounters issues
